response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be well above $10,000. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to purchase the product for $15,000. This special price reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs and surpass your expectations. I look forward to the opportunity to collaborate with you and see how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 15000}
